channel.title: Delete this
channel.description:
how do i add a command that switches between normal and ancients
i got the help i needed im done this can be deleted please.

item.title: Delete this
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

[quote=“musicmad441, post:5, topic:177056”]Here:

if (command.startsWith("switch")) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); //by musicmad RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 ancients = 0; sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!"); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }[/quote]

thanks it works

Read full topic

item.description:
@omg_ffs_ownd wrote:

umm…search for the ancients interface and you’ll most likely find the regular magics interface while there. and use those to switch between the two when making your command.
